# Summary


## Temperatures

```{r}
# get mean and 67th percentile global temperatures, peak and 2100 values
temps <- data %>%
  filter(region == "World") %>%
  filter(variable %in% c("AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|50.0th Percentile",
                         "AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|67.0th Percentile")) %>%
  group_by(model, scenario, variable)
temps_overview <- temps %>%
  summarise(peak=max(value), y2100 = value[period == 2100]) %>%
  summarise(T_peak_MED  = peak[variable == "AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|50.0th Percentile"],
            T_2100_MED  = y2100[variable == "AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|50.0th Percentile"],
            T_peak_67th = peak[variable == "AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|67.0th Percentile"],
            T_2100_67th = y2100[variable == "AR6 climate diagnostics|Surface Temperature (GSAT)|MAGICCv7.5.3|67.0th Percentile"])
print(temps_overview)
```
